version_description:
Bug fixed.
Leave feedback. Email us at info@cryptonewsmobile.com
We have optimized the application, all of the little mistakes and bugs have been fixed. Now news open via the app.

Bug fixes.
Added notifications.
Optimization and bug fixes.
Optimization and bug fixes.

- Minor bugs fixed.
- Compact mode of cards added.
- Image loading optimized.

- Optimization, fixed bugs.
- Pinned news.
- Choice of currency for the coin listing.
- Detailed information in the coin card.

- Two types of cryptonews’ display modes available.
- Categories added. Only the most important and hot coin news is displayed on the main page now.
- Bookmarks added.
- Pinned news added.
- Advertising option now available.

- Two types of cryptonews’ display modes available.
- Categories added. Only the most important and hot coin news is displayed on the main page now.
- Bookmarks added.
- Pinned news added.
- Advertising option now available.

- bugs fixed;
- performance improvements;
- errors of some articles links were also fixed.

News:
- Search in the news: exact match or overlap of words in the title;
- The ‘news categories’ menu is now on the main screen;
- News with push notifications is marked with "lightning" in the newsfeed.

Cryptocurrency rates:
- Search by coin name or its ticker symbol;
- Pin of the selected coin at the top of the list;
- The coin tab now contains its value on different exchanges;
- Notifications for changes in value, capitalization, trading volume per day of a particular coin, as well as the dominance of BTC;
- Notification Center, where all the received notifications regarding coins are kept.
Minor edits
- minor fixes;

- The screen of adding coin in "Portfolio" changed;
- The search of coin in "Market Cap" is done by name and ticker without choosing the search parameters;
- Small changes;
Small changes
- Small amendments
- Small changes.
- Small changes.
- Small changes.

- Spanish version added.
- Small changes.
- Small changes.

- Coin charts: a new period added — 1 year.
- Coin periods: a new period added — 3 months.
- Visual and technical improvements.

- Coin charts: a new period added — 1 year.
- Coin periods: a new period added — 3 months.
- Visual and technical improvements.

- Coin periods: a new period added — 3 months.
- Visual and technical improvements.
